Draft Rating:

B

Rod Thorn ranks in the 67th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Thorn's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots higher than they were picked due to his good drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Michael Jordan with 3th pick but was worth 1th pick.
  • Drafted Nikola Vučević with 16th pick but was worth 5th pick.
  • Drafted James Wilkes with 50th pick but was worth 29th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Dave Greenwood with 2th pick but was worth 46th pick.
  • Drafted Sidney Green with 5th pick but was worth 56th pick.
  • Drafted Kenyon Martin with 1th pick but was worth 4th pick.

Trade Rating:

B-

Rod Thorn ranks in the 61th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Chris Dudley, Jason Kidd to BRK.
  • Lost Stephon Marbury, Johnny Newman, Soumaila Samake to PHO.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Andrew Bynum, Jason Richardson to PHI.
  • Lost Maurice Harkless, Nikola Vučević, Landry Shamet to ORL.
  • Lost Andre Iguodala to DEN.

Signing Rating:

F

Rod Thorn ranks in the 7th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Coby Dietrick in 1979.
  • Signed Todd MacCulloch in 2001.
  • Signed Dudley Bradley in 1982.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Aaron Williams in 2000.
  • Signed Johan Petro in 2010.
  • Signed Travis Outlaw in 2010.
